text: Ramiz Tafë Alia (18 October 1925 – 7 October 2011) was the second and last leader of the People's Socialist Republic of Albania from 1985 to 1991 after Enver Hoxha died . He was First Secretary of the Party of Labor of Albania. He was also the country's head of state from 1982 to 1992. Alia died on 7 October 2011 in Tirana of lung disease, aged 85.Albania's last Communist leader Ramiz Alia dies, CNBC, 7 October 2011. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Deaths from lung disease Category:Presidents of Albania
title: Ramiz Alia
